00028 #ifndef _QICSSPAN_H
00029 #define _QICSSPAN_H
00030 
00031 #include <qvaluevector.h>
00032 
00050 class QicsSpan
00051 {
00052   public:
00056     QicsSpan() :
00057     _row(-1), _col(-1), _nrows(0), _ncols(0) {}
00063     QicsSpan(int begin_row, int begin_col, int nrows, int ncols)
00064         : 
00065     _row(begin_row), _col(begin_col), _nrows(nrows), _ncols(ncols) {}
00066 
00070     inline int row(void) const     { return _row; }
00074     inline int column(void) const  { return _col; }
00075     // Kept in for backward compatibility reasons
00076     inline int col(void) const  { return column(); }
00080     inline int height(void) const  { return _nrows; }
00084     inline int width(void) const  { return _ncols; }
00085 
00090     inline bool isValid(void) const
00091     { return ((_row < 0) || (_col < 0) || (_nrows <= 0) || (_ncols <= 0)); }
00092 
00097     inline bool containsCell(int row, int col) const
00098     {
00099         return (isValid() && (_row <= row) && (row < _row + _nrows) &&
00100             (_col <= col) && (col < _col + _ncols));
00101     }
00102 
00106     bool intersects(QicsSpan &s) const;
00107 
00108 private:
00109     int _row, _col, _nrows, _ncols;
00110 
00111     friend class QicsSpanManager;
00112 };
00113 
00118 typedef QValueVector<QicsSpan> QicsSpanList;
00119 
00120 #endif /*_FILE_H --- Do not add anything past this line */
